title: 196. Q&AF: Firing Employees, Merging Businesses & Making Big Purchases
itunes:title: 196. Q&AF: Firing Employees, Merging Businesses & Making Big Purchases
description: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on the uncomfortable reality of having to fire an employee, what you should keep in mind when acquiring or merging with another business, and how to know when you're ready to make your first big purchase.
content:encoded: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on the uncomfortable reality of having to fire an employee, what you should keep in mind when acquiring or merging with another business, and how to know when you're ready to make your first big purchase.
